data.title: Circle of Ambition
data.text:
Uniques

Grattus Signet Grattus Signet

Diamond RingRequires Level 20(20-30)% increased Global Critical Strike Chance(5-10)% increased Attack Speed

(5-10)% increased Cast Speed

+(40-60) to maximum Energy Shield

+(30-50) to maximum Life

Attacks inflict Unnerve on Critical Strike for 4 seconds

Spells inflict Intimidate on Critical Strike for 4 secondsThe first Grattus patriarch had only one tell. When he slowly turned his ring, all cowered before him.

Nevalius Inheritance Nevalius Inheritance

Cloth BeltRequires Level 16(15-25)% increased Stun and Block Recovery+(20-30) to Dexterity

150% increased Flask Effect Duration

Flasks applied to you have 60% reduced Effect

2% reduced Flask Effect Duration per Level

Flasks applied to you have 1% increased Effect per Level"I come from a long line of scholars, poets, and artists.

You can imagine how little we leave our children...

My father only gifted me one thing: for good or ill,

I don't know when to quit."

- Victario Nevalius, the People's Poet

The Hand of Phrecia The Hand of Phrecia

Mesh GlovesArmour: (87-113)

Energy Shield: (18-23)Requires Level 32, 26 Str, 26 Int(50-70)% increased Armour and Energy Shield

+(10-15)% to all Elemental Resistances

(20-40)% increased Effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills while you have a Linked Target

Linked Targets always count as in range of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills

Non-Curse Auras from your Skills only apply to you and Linked TargetsTo drive back the darkness, to bring peace, we must fight side by side as brothers.

The Perandus Pact The Perandus Pact

Prismatic JewelLimited to: 1

Radius: Large<Random modifier that grants bonus stats to passive skills in radius>It was more than luck that allowed the Perandus line

to turn even great misfortunes into golden

opportunities.Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

Veruso's Ambition Veruso's Ambition

Shackled BootsEvasion: (111-156)

Energy Shield: (23-33)Requires Level 34, 34 Dex, 34 IntGrants Level 20 Ravenous Skill

Enemies display their Monster Category

(80-120)% increased Evasion and Energy Shield

+(13-23)% to Chaos Resistance

(20-30)% increased Movement Speed"Follow me if you desire better for yourself, and for your

families. Follow me if you hunger for more than this!"
